name: BloomTD
description:
Survive

In the heartland of the Garo forests, the Myconians and the Drudge clans wage war to lay claim over natural resources. Centuries of ceaseless strife has seen the Myconians driven on the precipice of extinction. As the last major colony in the Mycorrhizal Network, it falls on you to stop the invading Drudges from snuffing out the last vestige of your existence.

Grow Stronger

Build up to 4 different towers to stop the relentless Drudges. Some towers grow more powerful over time, so get them early as possible! Each has unique strengths and weaknesses that need to be considered before placing them.

Adapt

Endure up to 10 waves of escalating difficulty, with up to 3 unique enemies to keep you on your toes. Can you save the Myconians from extinction? 

How-to-play

Use the left mouse button to drag towers onto available tiles. Stop enemies from reaching your base before you lose all your lives. Gain resources after every wave, and with every enemy killed to grow your defenses for up to 10 escalating waves.
